alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 09 at 5:58PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT/7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Big Bend Florida and Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, in Big Bend Florida, Franklin. In Panhandle Florida, Gulf. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EDT /700 PM CDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 556 PM EDT /456 PM CDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Creels, Hays Place, Beverly, Bay City, Green Point, High Bluff and Apalachicola Airport. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
